title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama; chat, embed, pull, and manage models from Python.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node and browsers via fetch.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration allowing Ollama models as LLM/Chat/Embeddings backends.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model management, multi-user, dark mode).

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-built interactive CLI with chat history, syntax highlighting, and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Lightweight GitHub Copilot-style VS Code extension powered by Ollama local models.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Simple retrieval-augmented generation pipeline using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector DB.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM client for Ollama; Kotlin & Scala friendly, supports streaming and embeddings.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama; chat, embed, list, pull models in C# with async I/O.

title: ollama-vscode
summary: VS Code extension to chat with local Ollama models inside the editor sidebar.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart for deploying Ollama in Kubernetes with GPU and persistent storage support.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama containers in CI pipelines for testing LLM features.

title: ollama-nim
summary: Nim language wrapper for Ollama REST API with async/await and type-safe models.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed client and CLI for Ollama with tokio streaming.

title: ollama-go
summary: Go(lang) client for Ollama; small surface, context cancellation, and embeddings support.

title: ollama-php
summary: Composer package for PHP to integrate Ollama chat, completions, and embeddings.

title: ollama-zig
summary: Zig client library for Ollama with async I/O and build.zig integration.

title: ollama-ruby
summary: Ruby gem wrapping Ollama REST endpoints; includes Rails generator for quick prototypes.

title: ollama-hass
summary: Home Assistant custom component exposing Ollama as a conversation agent for local voice/text.
